price: But those who believe and do righteous deeds, they will have Gardens of Bliss,
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتُ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
